title: Code fails to compile except in MPIDE-20120903

content.raw:
The interrupt-handling code (inherited from pineblaster) is chip-specific to the PIC32mx and may be fragile. In particular, it does not compile on available versions of MPIDE or UECIDE except MPIDE-20120903. This is related to the included version of the toolchain, and changes introduced to support newer chipsets (namely the PIC32mz).

See chipKIT discussion: http://chipkit.net/forum/viewtopic.php?t=3489

See branches of pineblaster: #!/labscript_suite/pineblaster/branches/

The problem is that the modifications to pineblaster reduced the size of the instruction space and increased the trigger latency. Investigate alternatives.
